definition: wildfire/(spreading like) wildfire/bush fire/farm fire (for clearing fields)
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
abbr. for 野火燒不盡，春風吹又生|野火烧不尽，春风吹又生[ye3 huo3 shao1 bu4 jin4 , chun1 feng1 chui1 you4 sheng1]
lit. even a prairie fire cannot destroy the grass - it grows again when the breeze blows (proverb)/fig. cannot be easily eliminated/abbr. to 野火春風|野火春风[ye3 huo3 chun1 feng1]
pinyin: ye3 huo3 shao1 bu4 jin4 , chun1 feng1 chui1 you4 sheng1
containing_words.word: 野火烧不尽，春风吹又生

sentences.english: Last year, high winds stoked wildfires in Southern California and destroyed thousands of homes.
sentences.chinese: 去年，强烈的风势加剧野火的灾情，摧毁数千户房屋。

sentences.english: Create this awesome looking spitfire in this Modeling and Texturing tutorial.
sentences.chinese: 本教程将为创建好的野火式战斗机的贴图。

sentences.english: The wheat crop was heavily damaged and wildfires spread across the country.
sentences.chinese: 小麦作物受到了严重的损害，整个国家野火遍布。

sentences.english: They talked of the A. I. D. S. epidemic spreading through the working class like wildfire.
sentences.chinese: 他们讨论艾滋病象野火一样在工人阶层中传播。

sentences.english: Wildfires burn it cannot be spring breeze blows, and it grows.
sentences.chinese: 野火焚烧也烧不尽，春风吹过来又滋生起来。

sentences.english: Wild Turkeys are masters of camouflage and evasion.
sentences.chinese: 野火鸡是巧于伪装，敏于逃遁的大师。

sentences.english: Showed concerned bush fire is newest on the side of these maps reportorial link.
sentences.chinese: 这些地图旁边显示了有关野火最新报道的链接。

sentences.english: JACK EFFEL: "I think poker has spread like wildfire."
sentences.chinese: 我认为扑克象野火一样漫延。

sentences.english: These dry katabatic winds are associated with spreading wildfires.
sentences.chinese: 这种干燥的重力风常会导致野火蔓延。

sentences.english: To spread like wildfire the transmission method must be rapidly scalable from small to very large.
sentences.chinese: 传递方式必须能迅速由小做大才能像野火一样飞窜。

sentences.english: California firefighters are battling a wildfire that's burning out of control.
sentences.chinese: 加州消防员正与一场失控的野火搏斗。

sentences.english: We can connect with anyone and spread gossip as fast as wild fire.
sentences.chinese: 我们能随便联系人或是像野火一样快地传播绯闻。
野火烧不尽，春风呼又生。

sentences.english: This is an image of wildfires in the Alaskan Interior.
sentences.chinese: 这是在阿拉斯加境内的野火景象。

sentences.english: The rumor spread like wildfire and cost me a lot of votes.
sentences.chinese: 谣言像野火一样蔓延，让我失去了不少选票。

sentences.english: Smoke from wildfires in Red Square last week (Image: Natalia Kolesnikova/AFP/Getty)
sentences.chinese: 上个星期，野火散发出的烟雾弥漫红场。
